casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jesse Dean HOPPES 191P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 David Weiss, Attorney at Law, Jesse Dean Hoppes, for Hoppes, Jesse Dean. Isham F. Hicks, Special Deputy Attorney General, Mike Miller, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of June 2018 by Defendant for Petition for En Banc Rehearing: "Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018." Ervin, J. Recused
